campaigns.name: Operation EchoStorm
campaigns.description: Coordinated disinformation campaign leveraging AI-generated content to influence public sentiment. Focused on immigration and economic instability.

campaigns.name: BlackMirror Initiative
campaigns.description: Campaign aiming to undermine vaccine confidence through emotional narratives and fake expert profiles. Signals indicate paid promotion behind spread.

campaigns.name: SilentCascade
campaigns.description: Actors attempting to create false perception of internal corruption in governmental departments through anonymous leaks and report mimicry.
